channel.title: Windows 7?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just got a new computer. It is running on windows 7. Whenever I load up any client it crashes about 10 secs when I log in. I woundered if i can fix this, PLUS, when i download JDK it allways says I dont have it when i compile, but i do. (I KNOW HOW TO MAKE A SERVER SO PLAEASE DONT SAY RIGHT CLICK COMPUTER, THEN GO TO PREFFRENCES, ...)
-Thanks aqzazq

item.title: Windows 7?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

What bubblegum said? XD

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7?
item.dc:creator: @bubblegum bubblegum
item.description:
@bubblegum wrote:

it is because you have an x86 bit computer and your files are in program files(x86) this is what i put in my client files and it works 100%.
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Set environmental variables foo!

Read full topic
